DPR Batasi Pembahasan RKUHP Hanya di Bagian Penjelasan
05 Nov 2019, 13:44 by Budiarti Utami Putri, Syailendra Persada
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Anggota Komisi Hukum atau Komisi III Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Arsul Sani ingin evaluasi Rancangan Kitab Undang-undang Hukum Pidana (RKUHP) dibatasi hanya pada Buku Penjelasan. Arsul mengaku tak setuju jika evaluasi itu menyangkut substansi pasal atau politik hukum.
"Sementara Komisi tiga masih tetap, kami buka ruangnya di penjelasan," kata Arsul di Kompleks Parlemen, Senayan, Jakarta, Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Arsul menegaskan Komisi Hukum DPR tak ingin lagi memperdebatkan apakah sebuah pasal harus ada atau tidak. Dia juga tak setuju jika harus menghapus ayat tertentu dari pasal-pasal yang ada di RKUHP.
Hal ini bertentangan dengan keinginan pemerintah. Menteri Hukum dan HAM Yasonna H. Laoly. sebelumnya menyatakan membuka peluang mengevaluasi pasal-pasal kontroversi dari RKUHP. Dia bahkan menyatakan akan membuang ketentuan yang menyebut kepala desa bisa menjadi pelapor dalam pasal kohabitasi atau kumpul kebo.
"Pasal kohabitasi, perlu dari kepala desa, walaupun kepala desa itu mesti izin orang tua, ya sudah buangkan saja. Orang tua aja supaya jangan jadi alat bancakan nanti," kata Yasonna di Kompleks Parlemen, Senayan, Jakarta, Senin, 4 November 2019.
Ketentuan soal kepala desa menjadi pengadu ini tertuang dalam Pasal 418 RKUHP ayat (3), yang berbunyi: "Pengaduan sebagaimana dimaksud pada ayat (2) dapat juga diajukan oleh kepala desa atau dengan sebutan lainnya sepanjang tidak terdapat keberatan dari suami, istri, Orang Tua, atau anaknya." Jika merujuk pernyataan Yasonna, ayat ini berpeluang dihapus.
Arsul melanjutkan, begitu pula halnya dengan pasal kontroversial lain yang ada di RKUHP seperti pasal aborsi, penggelandangan, dan kontrasepsi. Sekretaris Jenderal Partai Persatuan Pembangunan ini menganggap, perbaikan pada Buku Penjelasan akan menjadi pegangan bagi penegak hukum agar tidak ada pasal karet.
"Bagi PPP yang dibahas umumnya adalah formulasi terutama penjelasan, supaya tidak jadi pasal karet," ucapnya.
Anggota Komisi Hukum DPR dari Partai Demokrasi Indonesia Perjuangan, Ichsan Soelistio mengatakan, pasal kohabitasi itu tak akan diubah lantaran sudah melewati pembahasan panjang. Dia mengklaim aturan itu juga dibuat demi menghindari persekusi atau tindakan main hakim sendiri dari masyarakat.
"Kami pasang itu supaya jangan terjadi persekusi," kata Ichsan di lokasi yang sama.

DPR Limit the Discussion of the RKUHP only in the Explanation Section
05 Nov 2019, 13:44 by Budiarti Utami Putri, Syailendra Persada
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Members of the Law Commission or Commission III of the House of Representatives Arsul Sani want evaluation of the Draft Criminal Code Book (RKUHP) limited to the Explanatory Book. Arsul claimed not to agree if the evaluation was related to the substance of the article or legal politics.
"While Commission three remains, we open the space in explanation," Arsul said at the Parliament Complex, Senayan, Jakarta, Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
Arsul stressed that the DPR Law Commission no longer wanted to debate whether an article had to exist or not. He also did not agree if he had to delete certain verses from the articles in the RKUHP.
This is contrary to the wishes of the government. Minister of Law and Human Rights Yasonna H. Laoly. previously stated that it opened the opportunity to evaluate the controversial articles of the RKUHP. He even stated that he would discard the provision that said the village head could become a reporter in the cohabitation or cohabitation article.
"Article cohabitation needs to be from the village head, even though the village head needs parental permission, so just throw it away. Parents should not be used as tools for piracy later," said Yasonna at the Parliament Complex, Senayan, Jakarta, Monday, November 4, 2019.
The provisions concerning the village head being the complainant are contained in Article 418 RKUHP paragraph (3), which reads: "Complaints as referred to in paragraph (2) may also be submitted by the village head or with other designations as long as there are no objections from husbands, wives, Parents , or his child. " When referring to Jason's statement, this verse has the potential to be deleted.
Arsul continued, as well as other controversial articles in the RKUHP such as abortion, homelessness, and contraception. The Secretary-General of the United Development Party considers that improvements to the Explanatory Book will be a guide for law enforcement so that there is no rubber article.
"For PPP, the general discussion is formulation, especially explanation, so that it does not become a rubber article," he said.
Member of the DPR Law Commission from the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, Ichsan Soelistio said the article of cohabitation would not be changed because it had already been through lengthy discussions. He claimed the rules were also made in order to avoid persecution or vigilantism from the public.
"We installed it so that there would be no persecution," Ichsan said at the same location.
